about_the_game:
Your purchase directly supports our ongoing development efforts for future updates and exciting new content. As a token of our gratitude for your generous support, you'll enjoy the following perks:

  • Be the first to dive into the latest game builds.

  • Exclusive Bonus Content: Experience special in-game additions as game updates.

Thank you for being a crucial part of our journey. Your support means the world to us! There may be more benefits in the future, so stay tuned.

*Subject to the release schedule and may change.
